title: #164: How to Wow in Relationships & Business
description: I talk to media and image consultant Frances Cole Jones about how to put your best foot forward in your personal life and business. Lots of great actionable steps to help you make a great first impression.
author: contact@artofmanliness.com (The Art of Manliness)
